content.raw: Oh you're right, I don't think it would be an official "URI". I'm not sure what issue the extra `relative_path://` scheme is trying to fix though. My first impulse is not to add a new scheme that needs to be learned, since the use of relative paths is quite common in different applications and should be easier to look and know what it means.
